name: The Bus That Couldn't Slow Down (markmehere)
name_original: The Bus That Couldn't Slow Down (markmehere)
description:
A bus storms through the city needing to keep its speed above fifty or it will explode. From a helicopter, you need to help the bus negotiate its path to the airport. Try to hit as few (or as many) cars as you can on the way there.

The Bus That Couldn't Slow Down was written for the Portland Indie Game Squad's 2021 Summer Jam using Blender and Godot.

A fix has been issued for the end-of-game percentages, the final jump and airport scene memory management. The game's running time is four-and-a-half minutes.
